reviews.text: I was lucky enough to win two nights at this hotel from a Leading Hotels of the World competition. The hotel was very nice, we got a south facing room with really stunning views of the Swiss Alps (one step up from their bottom rate room). We were also lucky with the weather as the guy told us that snow had only fallen in the past three days.
reviews.title: Fantastic Spa, Excellent Service

reviews.text: We had breakfast but were a little disappointed. There were no croissants or pain au chocolate, only one type of salami, hot food was cooked to order but I did not like my lemon doused poached egg and received about two button mushrooms when I asked for mushrooms!
reviews.title: Best Spa après-ski

likes.liked: — the spa and the discreet but ever helping and nice staff

reviews.title: very stylish, big atmosphere, high price
reviews.text: The hotel spa was absolutely fantastic and we made good use of this as there was absolutely nothing else to do in the area. Arosa is a ski resort so unless you like ski-ing (season starts next week so all restaurants bar four were closed) then the area is a little dull.

Service was very good with nice little touches like laying out our pj's on the bed. I have marked this down to three stars due to the breakfast and overall to be honest, I don't think I could justify spending 500 Euros per night on a place like this. I have spent nights before in hotels in the UK which I paid £120 for which included a jacuzzi in the room and little touches like the turning of the bedsheets and complementary sweets and cleaning of the room twice a day.
reviews.title: Loved the Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel has lots of assets when you're going on a ski trip: Easy access from Zurich, a superb brand new spa, a funny little 6 seats luxurious monorail that takes you from the hotel door to the middle of the runs and the nicest perfectly multilingual staff ever: they are really the nicest people I've encountered in top hotels visited in the last few years, that deserves to be mentioned, at all levels of the hierarchy and tasks.
reviews.title: Amazing Experience
